description: 7.62x54mmR ammunition with a 150gr FMJ bullet.  The 7.62x54mmR round is one of the oldest still in common use, primarily due to the popularity of the Mosin-Nagant rifle.  It is a powerful cartridge capable of killing most targets with one shot.

7.62x54mmR ammunition with a 150gr FMJ bullet.  The 7.62x54mmR round is one of the oldest still in common use, primarily due to the popularity of the Mosin-Nagant rifle.  This one has been hand-reloaded by a survivor or perhaps a pre-Cataclysm hobbyist, leading to slightly inferior performance compared to factory-produced ammo.

7.62x54mmR ammunition with a 150gr FMJ bullet.  The 7.62x54mmR round is one of the oldest still in common use, primarily due to the popularity of the Mosin-Nagant rifle.  Someone was down on their luck when they hand-reloaded this one - it's filled with black powder instead of smokeless powder.  Expect lower velocity, muzzle smoke, and a dirtier barrel if you shoot it.
